channel.title: Delhi Government on Internet Freedom Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Delhi Government on Internet Freedom Foundation

item.title: Explained: Supreme Court upholds Delhi Assemblies summons to Facebook
item.description: IFF explains the decision of the Supreme Court rejecting the plea filed by the Managing Director of Facebook India, Ajit Mohan against the summons issued by the Peace and Harmony Committee of Delhi Assembly which sought his appearance in an inquiry related to the Delhi Riots.

item.title: Delhi Governmentâ€™s gag order on information on mucormycosis
item.description: Recently, the Delhi Government issued a notification prohibiting anyone from sharing any information on mucormycosis without the prior permission of the Government. IFF has sent the Government a legal notice urging it to rescind this overbroad order.
